Price: $34.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:43:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments
Players 2 2 1 - 2 2 - 6 2 - 6
Play Time 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 30 - 90 min 30 - 90 min
Designed by Psychologist
Premium Gift
Game Type Card Game Card Game Card Game Card Game Board Game

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU 4GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 1485 Mhz & Max Graphics Power of 75W, NVIDIA DLSS for groundbreaking AI rendering, 11th Gen Intel Core i5-11400H Processor (2.7GHz~4.5GHz), 16GB RAM (64GB Max), Gen4 512GB SSD, 15.6″ Thin Bezel FHD 1920×1080 IPS-level Anti-glare Display LCD (144Hz, 72% NTSC), X-Rite Pantone Certified, per unit factory calibrated, Windforce Infinity Next-gen Cooling for Laptop, 49W Battery, 4.8lb, 15 Full Area Colored RGB Backlit Keyboard; 14.21 (W) x 10.15 (D) x 1.09(H) inch
Boost Clock 1485 Mhz & Max Graphics Power of 75W
NVIDIA DLSS for groundbreaking AI rendering
1th Gen Intel Core i5-11400H Processor (2.7GHz~4.5GHz)

15 Full Area Colored RGB Backlit Keyboard; 14.21 (W) x 10.15 (D) x 1.09(H) inch


About Us

GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to Upgrade Your Life. With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as one of the leaders in the industry with products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, monitors, and other PC components and accessories.

Read more




That which resonates with your life

Upgrade Your Life is the core essence in everything we do at GIGABYTE. We break new ground. We also continuously provide reliable cloud infrastructure to help businesses optimize their operations as well as to advance development and expansion in the digital realm. By combining innovation and practicality, GIGABYTE wields the technology of the future to improve your life today.

When ideas manifest into reality

We have your bases covered, starting with the motherboard. With an established reputation for trusted quality, we pushed forward with graphics cards, laptops, and mini PCs, and corporations worldwide depend on us for reliable server solutions. Most of all, we have always been there innovating products that will spark your creativity.

Foretelling your future in tech

Visualize this: Tapping your phone connects you to cloud. Your city is on a 5G network integrating medical, transportation, and power services. Our vast product range can meet your personal, business, and computing needs and prepare you for future trends and developments. Using technology, we can achieve anything we visualize, and beyond.

Read more

From the manufacturer

New Sprouts Fix It!

Give your little fixer everything they need to complete pretend construction and repair jobs with New Sprouts Fix It!, one of the popular pretend play activity sets from Learning Resources!

Pretend Tools for Little Hands!

Sized for little hands, this set’s five toddler-safe tools include a pretend saw, screwdriver, hammer, wrench, and drill!

Imaginative Fix-It Adventures!

Made from chunky plastic, these pretend tools add a touch of realism to all kinds of imaginative playthe drill even makes noise!

Toolbox for Storage!

When repairs are finished for the day, all of the tools store safely inside the included tool box until the next game of pretend.

Ages & Stages

Imaginative Skills

Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play!

Hand Strength

Give little hands the strength they need to hold a pencil, play on the playground, and more with this fun hands-on toy!

Social Skills

Kids develop social-emotional learning skills with this toy’s fun activities that support healthy emotions and communication!

Building Someone Amazing

When the toy you choose is from Learning Resources, you’re helping your child build who they will become – whether an architect, an A student, or just an all-around awesome kid!

TOY TOOLS: Little tools for big imaginary projects. Surprise your children with this toddler tool set
TODDLER-SAFE TOOLS: Encourage imaginative play with toddler-safe tools made from durable, soft plastic
TODDLER TOOLBOX INCLUDES: Includes saw, hammer, screwdriver, wrench, drill, and toolbox
REALISTIC SOUNDS: Squeeze the drill and it makes sounds
Give the Gift of Learning: Whether youre shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift!
Kids’ Toys for Stocking Stuffers!: From fidget toys and board games to puzzles and beyond, our screen-free learning and education toys make the perfect Christmas gifts for boys and girls!

Introductions:
Our Chair Floor Mat is made of thick PVC and free of the BPA.It measures 1.5mm in height, give your floor and furniture the best protection with this product.
Sturdy yet lasting material protects flooring against harsh scuffs and scratches that desk chair can cause.
In addition to its considerable strength, the hard-flooring mat also impresses with all the comforts you can expect from a high-quality office chair underlay.
Features:
-Offer a protection solution for hard floor and carpet tiles
-Anti-slip designed to achieve a strong grip without piercing or damaging your floor
-Crack and scratch resistant under standard use
-Extremely durable and impact-resistant
-Transparent
-Suitable for hardwood floor
Specifications:
-Size:47*36inches
-Weight:4.4lbs
-Material:PVC
– Thickness:0.06inches

Warm Tips
1.These mats may be rolled when packaged. In such cases, the PVC material may take a few hours to return to its original shape once unpacked.
2.The mat should be placed smooth side down (facing the floor), textured side up.

Please follow below steps:
1. Spread chair mat, begin to roll back from the front direction, put a night,it will naturally flat out.
2.Or get some warm water to make it soften, spread it to the opposite direction down.
PVC CHAIR MAT FOR LIGHT USE:Suitable for hardwood floorvinyl, hardwood, laminate, stone, tile and concrete. Not recommended for carpet. You can use it in the office, at home and so on. It’s very convenient.
ANTI-SLIP:Frosting on the surface can achieve a strong grip which prevent the chair from slipping while controlling the roll of the chair which also helps to considerably reduce the risk of leg fatigue.
DURABILITY:The floor mat is stronger and more durable.You don’t have to worry about bending when you use it, or accidentally breaking it and causing scratches.It’s designed are designed to provide high impact resistance.
HEALTHY MATERIAL:Made of PVC and free of the BPA. It contains no volatile toxin, no special odor, for a healthy indoor environment.Even if your child is lying on the chair mat, you can rest assured.
PROTECTIVE FLOOR:Help to protect your floor from scratches and damage caused by office chair casters and protect your floor. Its made to be convenient for persons who constantly move around in office chair.

item.title: Dog Chew Toys for Puppy Teething – 20 Pack Indestructible Pet Dog Toys for Puppy Chewers, Interactive Tug of War Rope Toys for Puppies, Small Dogs Durable Squeaky Toys for Boredom Chew Teething
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun! Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture! KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions : 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available : September 30, 2021
Manufacturer : qinhe
ASIN : B09HJR2GBB

Small Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? Our toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
Interactive Training Small Dog Toys: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
Safe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
Quality Gifts And Service: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Price: $29.95 - $25.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:19:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The only tool in the marketplace able to diagnose & repair LED lights!

The LED Keeper fixes LED holiday light sets. It is every decorator’s must-have and saves you not only time, but money. No need to toss your pre-lit dcor when you have lights out. Use the LED Keeper to keep your holidays bright!

How it Works

The LED Keeper uses insulation piercing to connect to the copper within the light set wires and illuminate functioning sections by creating mini-circuits. Success is achieved through the process of elimination.

Complete Tool for the Repair of LED Light Sets

The LED Keeper pays for itself and is provides everything you’d need to fix a light set:

Built-in Bulb & Fuse Tester
Includes 2 Universal Replacement PODs
2 Place Markers to assist in testing are also included
Comes complete with a 9V battery
Has a Bulb Puller

Fixes sets with replaceable or non-replaceable bulbs

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.

Every decorator’s must-have!

This Cool Yule Tool saves you time and money. No more throwing your light sets and pre-lit dcor away. Now you can save them with the squeeze of a trigger. There are also numerous resources available to assist you as you become a light set repair Pro yourself! We have instructional videos and even have a toll-free number available with U.S.-based techs to assist in all of your light set repair questions.

Fixes LED Light Sets (Does NOT work on Incandescent light sets)
2 Universal PODs included to assist with socket issues or if you simply don’t have the correct replacement bulb your set requires
2 Place Markers included to assist with testing
One 9 Volt battery included
Pays for itself
Intended for conventional Christmas LED light sets that are manufactured in series design.
Cannot assist with incandescent, rope lights, light sets with control boxes, low voltage or battery-operated light sets.

Fixes sets with replaceable or non-replaceable bulbs

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.


Every decorator’s must-have!

This Cool Yule Tool saves you time and money. No more throwing your light sets and pre-lit dcor away. Now you can save them with the squeeze of a trigger. There are also numerous resources available to assist you as you become a light set repair Pro yourself! We have instructional videos and even have a toll-free number available with U.S.-based techs to assist in all of your light set repair questions.

Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6 making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52 width by 84 Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104 width by 84 Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.
